text: Mario Norberto Chaldú (6 June 1942 – 2 April 2020) was an Argentine football forward. He played for Argentina in the 1966 FIFA World Cup. He also played for CA Banfield, San Lorenzo de Almagro, Racing Club and CA Kimberley in the Argentinian League system. He was born in Buenos Aires. Chaldú died on 2 April 2020 at a hospital in Monte Grande, Argentina of a long-illness at the age of 77.Falleció el exfutbolista Mario Chaldú ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Argentine footballers
title: Mario Chaldú
